qas.question: Where were most of the surviving children?
What did these children do on that day?
Where did parents go to mourn their children?

context: On <a0_0>Children's Day<a0_0/>, <a4_0>June 1<a4_0/>, 2008, many parents went to the <a3_0>rubble of schools<a3_0/> to mourn for their children. The surviving children, who were mostly <a1_0>living <a5_0>in relief centres<a5_0/><a1_0/>, <a2_0>performed ceremonies<a2_0/> marking the special day, but also acknowledging the earthquake.
